desc: At Kidiwinkle, you never get bored. We have loads of fun and entertainment for you. Not only this but toys, DVDs, storybooks, our merchandise collection: school bags, scarves, socks, hats, shirts, gloves, fun stickers and much more. Parents, you can send us your child drawings/stories by email to publish on our blog.

layout.text: "Kidi Winkle" has quickly captured the attention and hearts of children, and now he wants to make his content even more accessible to his young audience
